data.name: Dead Hungry Demo
data.detailed_description: The DEAD HUNGRY DEMO IS OUT! Take a large bite of the first VR offering from well-known PixelJunk series developer Q-Games! Dead Hungry is a fast-paced crazy and panicky action game in which you are a fearless food-truck chef working overtime to end the invading zombie menace. Sate their hunger with an order of burger, soda and fries! Feed the swarms of ravished zombie schoolgirls, Japanese office workers, and sumo wrestlers turning them back into well-fed members of society before your very eyes! Cook the food well and stack burgers as high as you can in this addictive and surreal zombie defense game.
data.about_the_game: The DEAD HUNGRY DEMO IS OUT! Take a large bite of the first VR offering from well-known PixelJunk series developer Q-Games! Dead Hungry is a fast-paced crazy and panicky action game in which you are a fearless food-truck chef working overtime to end the invading zombie menace. Sate their hunger with an order of burger, soda and fries! Feed the swarms of ravished zombie schoolgirls, Japanese office workers, and sumo wrestlers turning them back into well-fed members of society before your very eyes! Cook the food well and stack burgers as high as you can in this addictive and surreal zombie defense game.
data.short_description: Try out the demo version of Dead Hungry, a fast-paced hilarious panicky action game in which you are a fearless food-truck chef working overtime to end the invading zombie menace-by sating their hunger with an order of burger, soda and fries! Stack burgers precariously to the ceiling using farm-fresh ingredients, and pretty much just about anything else you can get your hands on!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
